en.title: More about me
en.about me: I am an AWS certified full stack software engineer with {{count}}+ years of demonstratable experience & ability in the industry creating web apps, design and deploy them to be highly available, highly scalable (on demand) and effectively reduce cost with maximum efficiency into your business.

ja.title: 自己紹介
ja.about me: 私は{{count}}年以上の経験と能力を持つAWS認定のフルスタックソフトウェアエンジニアであり、Webアプリを作成する業界で実証可能な経験と能力を持っています。
